text: Sonia Melissa Kruger (born 28 August 1965) is an Australian television presenter and actress from Queensland. Kruger has been the host of multiple TV shows over the years including the Australian versions of Dancing with the Stars, The Voice and Big Brother Australia. She was also the host of the daytime television show Today Extra. Kruger has attracted criticism for her comments about Muslim people and immigrants.Gavin Fernando (2016) "Television personality Sonia Kruger calls for Australia to ban Muslims" News.com.au, 18 July 2016. Retrieved 18 July 2016. == Sources == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian actors
title: Sonia Kruger
